title: Grand Opening: Private Island Getaway with Return Boat Transfers & Decadent Dining
description: Discover an enchanting ecological escape on a private island in the Cambodian Riviera at the brand-new Alila Villas Koh Russey. Newly opened in November 2018, this five-star retreat is located on the exclusive island of Koh Russey, with complimentary return boat transfers to and from the resort making your getaway a breeze. Wake up to a daily breakfast and enjoy flexible dining with your choice of daily lunch or dinner included - inclusive of one glass of wine, beer or cocktail each. You’ll also enjoy one 60-minute massage per person throughout your stay, making this the ultimate relaxing Cambodian getaway.
offer_address: Koh Russey Island (Bamboo Island) Ream Ream, 18108, Cambodia

title: Private Cambodian Island Retreat with Indulgent Daily Dining
description: Discover an enchanting ecological escape on a private island in the Cambodian Riviera at Alila Villas Koh Russey. This five-star retreat is located on the exclusive island of Koh Russey, with complimentary return boat transfers to and from the resort making your escape a breeze. Wake up to daily breakfast and enjoy flexible dining with your choice of daily lunch or dinner - inclusive of one glass of wine, beer or cocktail each. You’ll also enjoy one 60-minute massage per person and a bottle of wine in your room on arrival.
offer_address: Koh Russey Island (Bamboo Island) Ream Ream, 18108, Cambodia
